name: Tab-manager
tagline: Full screen tab management for google chrome
body:
tab-manager

Full screen tab management for google chrome

Description

This is an extension for google chrome which will enable you to manage open tabs when inside fullscreen on a webpage.

To Do:

  • Upload to the chrome extension store

Change log:

  • Pack the extension
  • Draw 16x16 png icon for the extension
  • Added a check for http:// so new tabs will work without errors
  • Added a shortcut to open the pop-up window
  • Added a way to open a new url in the current tab
  • Added a checkbox to select whether a new tab should be opened
  • Added a method to close a tab
  • Added a new link to close the tab
  • Reduced the number of characters for the close button
  • Added a counter for the tabs
  • Added a limit to the number of characters in a title
  • Added a full list of the tabs
  • Added a new tab input form
  • Reduce the need for http://
  • Created structure for the extension

Installation:

Version 1
  1. Download the files from github
  2. Extract the items
  3. Open up a chrome window
  4. Navigate to the tab-creator files in explorer
  5. Drag the tab-creator.crx file into the chrome window
  6. Click on the install button in the pop-up window
  7. Enjoy!
Version 2
  1. Download the zipped files
  2. Extract the files
  3. Open up google chrome
  4. Navigate to extension viewer
    • (chrome://extensions in the url bar)
    • Options menu >> More tools >> Extensions
  5. Select the 'Developer mode' checkbox
  6. Click on 'Load unpacked extension...'
  7. Locate the src folder that was extracted earlier
  8. Enjoy...
Use
Press "Ctrl + Shift + Y" to open up the extension window in order to use it in full screen
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
